Description:
A Wonderfully Unique Heart Warmer on 1,413 sq m approx.
Privately set back on a lush 1,413 sq m approx. block, this wonderfully unique home will capture your heart with its flexible family-focused floorplan, glorious garden surrounds and prominent location that has the area's finest amenities at its fingertips.
Proudly displaying Merchant Builder's popular 'courtyard house' design, characterised by timber-lined ceilings with exposed beams and large windows that let natural light stream through every room, it encompasses dual living wings that culminate at front and back courtyards. Possessing plenty of scope to add your own personal touches, its sublime sun-soaked interior takes in scenic green vistas at every glance; enhancing a comfortable lounge and dining room with open fireplace and a connecting fully equipped kitchen that boasts a social island breakfast bar. An oak tree canopied alfresco can be accessed from here - beautifully screened by bamboo and framed by a lawn area with cubby house that leads the way to several meandering pathways. A master bedroom with bright en-suite concludes the left wing of the home, which is centred by an intimate covered entertaining deck.
The right wing used to host a second kitchen and has the plumbing to re-instate one for extended family arrangements. Currently comprising an expansive open family/rumpus room, two additional bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, an office/optional fourth bedroom plus a modernised bathroom with walk-in shower. Enriched with quality inclusions, it features: gas ducted heating, split system air conditioning, an automatic sprinkler system, automatic gated driveway that supplies abundant off-street parking plus a remote four-car garage with pot belly stove and workshop space.
Resting at the foot of Birt's Hill, its central position is within a direct walk or short commute to buses, Warrien Reserve, kindergartens, childcare centres, Croydon Primary School, Croydon Central Shopping Centre, Croydon Main Street and Train Station. Only minutes further to Luther and Oxley Colleges, Yarra Valley Grammar, Chirnside Park and Eastland Shopping Centres plus the EastLink freeway.
* Wonderfully unique Merchant Builder home set back on a private 1,413 sq m approx. block

* Covered back entertaining deck complemented by a front oak tree canopied alfresco
* Three robed bedrooms, an office/fourth bedroom and two bathrooms
* Ducted heating, air conditioning, automatic gated driveway plus a 4-car remote garage
* Located within arm's reach of public transport, reserves, premium schools and shopping precincts

A storybook inspired sanctuary of space
Peacefully secluded in the exclusive and enchanting Dunalister Park enclave on its own sizeable title, this exquisite storybook style home epitomises family harmony and charm. Immersed in glorious, vibrant Edna Walling gardens enticing birdlife that elevate the beauty of the large near-half acre allotment.

An upper rumpus/retreat is central to the children's domain and family bathroom with luxe bath and picture-perfect views of the Dandendong Ranges.
Set on a no through road, the home is merely minutes to Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, Oxley College, Good Shepherd Primary and Croydon Hills Primary.
